query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS report_archive (
  id VARCHAR(36) PRIMARY KEY,
  report_type ENUM('monthly', 'quarterly', 'annual', 'special', 'custom') NOT NULL,
  title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  title_ar VARCHAR(255),
  description TEXT,
  description_ar TEXT,
  period_start DATE NOT NULL,
  period_end DATE NOT NULL,
  version INT DEFAULT 1,
  previous_version_id VARCHAR(36),
  file_url VARCHAR(500),
  file_size_kb INT,
  generated_by VARCHAR(100) DEFAULT 'system',
  key_metrics JSON,
  exchange_rate_aden DECIMAL(10,2),
  exchange_rate_sanaa DECIMAL(10,2),
  spread_percentage DECIMAL(5,2),
  gdp_estimate DECIMAL(15,2),
  inflation_rate DECIMAL(5,2),
  humanitarian_funding DECIMAL(15,2),
  event_count INT DEFAULT 0,
  data_quality_score DECIMAL(3,2),
  is_published BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
  published_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX idx_report_type (report_type),
  INDEX idx_period (period_start, period_end),
  INDEX idx_version (previous_version_id)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS report_version_changes (
  id VARCHAR(36) PRIMARY KEY,
  report_id VARCHAR(36) NOT NULL,
  from_version INT NOT NULL,
  to_version INT NOT NULL,
  change_type ENUM('data_update', 'correction', 'methodology', 'addition', 'removal') NOT NULL,
  field_changed VARCHAR(100),
  old_value TEXT,
  new_value TEXT,
  change_reason TEXT,
  changed_by VARCHAR(100),
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX idx_report_changes (report_id)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS report_trend_analysis (
  id VARCHAR(36) PRIMARY KEY,
  indicator_code VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  indicator_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  indicator_name_ar VARCHAR(255),
  analysis_period VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
  start_value DECIMAL(15,4),
  end_value DECIMAL(15,4),
  change_absolute DECIMAL(15,4),
  change_percentage DECIMAL(10,4),
  trend_direction ENUM('up', 'down', 'stable') NOT NULL,
  volatility_score DECIMAL(5,2),
  confidence_level ENUM('A', 'B', 'C', 'D', 'E') DEFAULT 'B',
  analysis_notes TEXT,
  analysis_notes_ar TEXT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX idx_indicator (indicator_code),
  INDEX idx_period (analysis_period)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS report_archive (
  id VARCHAR(36) PRIMARY KEY,

  previous_version_id VARCHAR(36),
  file_url VARCHAR(500),
  file_size_kb INT,
  generated_by VARCHAR(100) DEFAULT 'system',
  key_metrics JSON,
  exchange_rate_aden DECIMAL(10,2),
  exchange_rate_sanaa DECIMAL(10,2),
  spread_percentage DECIMAL(5,2),
  gdp_estimate DECIMAL(15,2),
  inflation_rate DECIMAL(5,2),
  humanitarian_funding DECIMAL(15,2),
  event_count INT DEFAULT 0,

  is_published BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
  published_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX idx_report_type (report_type),
  INDEX idx_period (period_start, period_end),
  INDEX idx_version (previous_version_id)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS report_version_changes (
  id VARCHAR(36) PRIMARY KEY,
  report_id VARCHAR(36) NOT NULL,

  to_version INT NOT NULL,
  change_type ENUM('data_update', 'correction', 'methodology', 'addition', 'removal') NOT NULL,
  field_changed VARCHAR(100),
  old_value TEXT,
  new_value TEXT,
  change_reason TEXT,
  changed_by VARCHAR(100),
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX idx_report_changes (report_id)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS report_trend_analysis (
  id VARCHAR(36) PRIMARY KEY,
  indicator_code VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  indicator_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  indicator_name_ar VARCHAR(255),
  analysis_period VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
  start_value DECIMAL(15,4),
  end_value DECIMAL(15,4),

  trend_direction ENUM('up', 'down', 'stable') NOT NULL,
  volatility_score DECIMAL(5,2),
  confidence_level ENUM('A', 'B', 'C', 'D', 'E') DEFAULT 'B',
  analysis_notes TEXT,
  analysis_notes_ar TEXT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX idx_indicator (indicator_code),
  INDEX idx_period (analysis_period)
);
